duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide financial education and consulting services to clients to help them gain control of their finances.
Offer insurance products and investment opportunities to clients based on their financial needs.
Mentor and provide field training to new agents to support their professional development.
Set and achieve personal financial goals while networking with potential clients and meeting new people.
Manage time effectively and set personal work schedule to maximize productivity.
Undergo background check and secure necessary licensing and certifications to operate in the financial industry.
Collaborate with colleagues to expand the business and establish new office locations across the US.

education_certification.credential: No specific educational requirement, but financial certifications and licensing are mandatory.
